title: Multiple interactions part of circular flow

content.description: The circular flow of economic activity between consumers and producers includes which of the following?
content.question: Households buy factor services from firms.Households sell factor services to firms.Households buy outputs from firms.Households sell outputs to firms.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
